channel.title: Help with pictures -Prt Scrn Sys Rq-
channel.description:
how doy uo guys make a picture like for example a picture of something like... you found a virus on your ocmputer and you don't take a picture of the whole page just the thing that says a virus was detected
like this pic without the white to the left...
i made it smaller but thats all i can do example of how I want it:
[IMG]http://i5.tinypic.com/6c611sx.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i15.tinypic.com/661iyo7.png[/img]
I want a picture thats on the bottom to go to the top left
this is the best one i've done -.-
[IMG]http://i15.tinypic.com/5zcmqfb.png[/img]

item.title: Help with pictures -Prt Scrn Sys Rq-
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

Who said he has photoshop?

Considering this guy is a very slow learner, and 10 people have already said the same thing, try saying it differently, or help him further.

Runescape.com, just select the area you want with the select tool, then hit Ctrl+C. Go to File->New and then go into Image->Attributes and change the width to 1 pixel and height to 1 pixel. Finally, hit Ctrl+V and there you go. File->Save !

Read full topic
item.source: Help with pictures -Prt Scrn Sys Rq-

item.title: Help with pictures -Prt Scrn Sys Rq-
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

[quote=“Runescape.com, post:10, topic:139040”]It says nothing about that :mad:

why can’t someone just teach me [/quote]

The whole article is about the crop tool… You would have known that had you not been turned off by all of the text giving you a detailed tutorial on how to use it:

In order to learn, you must read.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with pictures -Prt Scrn Sys Rq-

item.title: Help with pictures -Prt Scrn Sys Rq-
item.dc:creator: @Baros_Rocks Baros Rocks
item.description:
@Baros_Rocks wrote:

Get the crop tool, drag it over your object,
Then right click and ‘copy’ (of ctrl+ c),
Open up a new paint, paste (ctrl + v).

Read full topic

item.title: Help with pictures -Prt Scrn Sys Rq-
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

[quote=“Runescape.com, post:6, topic:139040”] Where is graphics request and help

p.s. this picture ~><~ i just found it on my server sprites[br][size=1]Posted on: August 31, 2007, 04:12:06 PM[/size][hr]please help anyone that guide didnt help at all :([/quote]

The guide tells you exactly how to use the crop tool, in detail, and with pictures. Believe it or not, it even explains what the crop tool is for. If it didn’t help you either can’t read or aren’t motivated enough to read the entire thing.

And if you aren’t motivated enough you don’t deserve to use the crop tool.

Read full topic
